channel.title: Xubuntu imgburn error
channel.description:
[img]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/186/wowwo.png[/img] (the file wasn't chosen, as I just opened imgburn, but I get the same error "Device not ready (medium not present - tray closed)"
if it helps I converted my D:\ to NTFS
and the DVD I'm using is a Phillips DVD+R 4.7gb 120mb 1-16x speed
I don't get what I'm doing wrong..

item.title: Xubuntu imgburn error
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

[quote=“Natey, post:5, topic:342668”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=439069.msg3227020#msg3227020 date=1275680116]
You’re trying to burn a DVD with a CD writer?
[/quote]the tutorial I’m following said to do so.[/quote]
Well I guess if the tutorial said that, you damn well better do it! Incompatible media is a just myth anyways.

Read full topic
